dashboard.bucket.category_columns_warnin.comment: Warning message when trying to add too many columns. The placeholders {oldLimit} and {oldRowsLimit} will be replaced with numbers, e.g., 'Cannot add columns: limit is 10 measures and 20 rows. Follow the limits to add more'.

dashboard.bucket.category_columns_warnin.comment: Warning message when trying to add too many columns. The placeholders {oldLimit} and {oldRowsLimit} will be replaced with numbers, e.g., 'Cannot add columns: limit is 10 metrics and 20 rows. Follow the limits to add more'.

dashboard.bucket.category_measures_rows_.value: To add up to {limit} more, remove all items from columns section
dashboard.bucket.category_measures_rows_.comment: Warning message when trying to add more items. The placeholder {limit} will be replaced with a number, e.g., 'To add up to 5 more, remove all items from columns section'.

Add a primary measure to your visualization, or switch to table.

properties.clustering.amount.partial.tit.comment: Message title that is shown when clustering amount is higher than the number of visualization data points.

properties.clustering.amount.partial.des.value: The available data points don't cover the entire selected amount.

properties.clustering.disabled.value: Clustering requires 2 Metrics and View by, without Segment by.

properties.axis.name.position.bottom.comment: Bottom position option for axis name

properties.orientation.title.comment: The title for the orientation configuration section

properties.points.groupNearbyPoints.comment: Option to group nearby points on map visualizations

properties.points.size.title.comment: Size of a point on a map

properties.points.size.extra_small.comment: Multiplicator of size of a point on map. Means 50% of size.

properties.points.size.small.comment: Multiplicator of size of a point on map. Means 75% of size.

properties.points.size.normal.comment: Multiplicator of size of a point on map. Means 100% of size.

properties.points.size.large.comment: Multiplicator of size of a point on map. Means 125% of size.

properties.points.size.extra_large.comment: Multiplicator of size of a point on map. Means 150% of size.

properties.points.size.min.title.comment: Smallest size of a point on a map

properties.points.size.max.title.comment: Largest size of a point on a map

properties.viewport.area.auto_default.comment: All data will be visibled on the map

properties.viewport.area.continents.comment: Viewport area option for continent-level map view

properties.comparison.calculationType.ti.comment: The label of calculation type dropdown

properties.comparison.calculationType.as.comment: The title of the dropdown option that specifies the arithmetic operation to calculate the change between two values.
The title of the dropdown option that specifies the arithmetic operation to calculate the ratio between two values.
The title of the dropdown option that specifies the arithmetic operation to calculate the difference between two values.
The title of the dropdown option that specifies the arithmetic operation to calculate the change and difference between two values.

properties.comparison.calculationType.as.value: Calculates the relative change between primary and secondary metric values.
properties.comparison.calculationType.as.comment: The content describes the pertinent scenarios for the change calculation.

properties.comparison.calculationType.as.value: Calculates the relative change between primary and secondary measure values.
properties.comparison.calculationType.as.comment: The content describes the pertinent scenarios for the change calculation.

properties.comparison.calculationType.as.value: Quantifies the share of the primary metric value in the secondary metric value.
properties.comparison.calculationType.as.comment: The content describes the pertinent scenarios for the ratio calculation.

properties.comparison.calculationType.as.value: Quantifies the share of the primary measure value in the secondary measure value.
properties.comparison.calculationType.as.comment: The content describes the pertinent scenarios for the ratio calculation.

properties.comparison.calculationType.as.value: Calculates the absolute difference between primary and secondary metric values.
properties.comparison.calculationType.as.comment: The content describes the pertinent scenarios for the difference calculation.

properties.comparison.calculationType.as.value: Calculates the absolute difference between primary and secondary measure values.
properties.comparison.calculationType.as.comment: The content describes the pertinent scenarios for the difference calculation.

properties.comparison.calculationType.as.value: Calculates both the relative change and absolute difference between primary and secondary metric values.
properties.comparison.calculationType.as.comment: The content describes the pertinent scenarios for the change (difference) calculation.

properties.comparison.calculationType.as.value: Calculates both the relative change and absolute difference between primary and secondary measure values.
properties.comparison.calculationType.as.comment: The content describes the pertinent scenarios for the change (difference) calculation.

properties.comparison.calculationType.to.comment: The title of the section that describes the formula for the calculation
The title of the section that describes the formula for the change calculation
The title of the section that describes the formula for the difference calculation

properties.comparison.calculationType.as.comment: The content describes the formula of the change calculation.
The content describes the formula of the ratio calculation.
The content describes the formula of the difference calculation.

properties.comparison.calculationType.to.comment: The title of the section that provides an example for the calculation

properties.comparison.calculationType.as.value: Year-over-year sales change = (the current year's sales - the previous year's sales) / the previous year's sales
properties.comparison.calculationType.as.comment: The example illustrating the change calculation.

properties.comparison.calculationType.as.value: Current sales compared to a quota = current sales / quota
properties.comparison.calculationType.as.comment: The example illustrating the ratio calculation.

properties.comparison.calculationType.as.value: Year-over-year sales difference = the current year's sales - the previous year's sales
properties.comparison.calculationType.as.comment: The example illustrating the difference calculation.

properties.comparison.calculationType.as.value: Year-over-year sales change = [(the current year's sales - the previous year's sales) / the previous year's sales] AND [the current year's sales - the previous year's sales]
properties.comparison.calculationType.as.comment: The example illustrating the change (difference) calculation.

properties.comparison.measureNumber.form.comment: An item in list of formatting presets. Means: use inherited measure format
An item in list of formatting presets. Whole number without decimal numbers.
An item in list of formatting presets. Decimal number measure format with one decimal number.
An item in list of formatting presets. Decimal number measure format with two decimal numbers.
An item in list of formatting presets. Whole number without decimal numbers and with % sign at the end.
An item in list of formatting presets. Decimal number with one decimal number and % sign at the end.
An item in list of formatting presets. Decimal number with two decimal numbers and % sign at the end.
An item in list of formatting templates. Whole number without decimal numbers.
An item in list of formatting templates. Decimal number measure format with one decimal number.
An item in list of formatting templates. Decimal number measure format with two decimal numbers.
An item in list of formatting templates. Whole number without decimal numbers and with % sign at the end.
An item in list of formatting templates. Decimal number with one decimal number and % sign at the end.
An item in list of formatting templates. Decimal number with two decimal numbers and % sign at the end.
An item in list of formatting templates. Number with currency sign.
An item in list of formatting templates. Number with currency sign shortened with K, M, B and T characters.
An item in list of formatting templates. Number shortened with K, M, B and T characters.
An item in list of formatting templates. Colored number shortened with K, M, B and T characters.
An item in list of formatting templates. Number is formatted in red color if negative.
An item in list of formatting templates. Number is in brackets if negative.
An item in list of formatting templates.
An item in list of formatting templates. Numbers is formatted in different colors based on its value.
An item in list of formatting templates. Numbers is formatted in different colors prefixed with arrow symbol based on its value.
An item in list of formatting templates. Seconds are formatted properly in hours, minutes and seconds.
An item in list of formatting templates. Null value is replaced with 0.
